original_text: His officers counted all the Levites who were 30 years old or older. There were 38,000 men.
korean_text: 레위 사람은 삼십 세 이상으로 계수하니 모든 남자의 수가 삼만 팔천 명인데

sentences.original_text: His officers counted all the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 관원들이 모든 레위 사람들을 세었습니다

sentences.original_text: who were 30 years old or older
